title: Tech Stack
description: These are the main technologies and tools used in the projects.

techStacks.name: Frontend
techStacks.description: Web development using React, Vue, and Fresh.

techStacks.name: Backend
techStacks.description: Server development with Node.js, Express, and Django.

techStacks.name: Blockchain
techStacks.description: Smart contract development with Solidity and Web3.js.

techStacks.name: Database
techStacks.description: Data management with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Firebase.

techStacks.name: DevOps
techStacks.description: Deployment and operation with Docker, AWS, and Vercel.

techStacks.name: Testing
techStacks.description: Test automation with Jest and Cypress.

techStacks.name: Content
techStacks.description: Content management with Markdown and CMS.
